org.svvrl.goal.core.comp.safra
Class Node

java.lang.Object
  org.svvrl.goal.core.comp.safra.Node
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable
public class Node
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable

A Node is a tree node in a Safra tree. To create a node in a Safra tree, use SafraTree#createNode(Node, StateSet).

Author:
Ming-Hsien Tsai

addChild

public void addChild(Node n)
Inserts a node as a child of this node. The older siblings relation will be updated automatically.

Parameters:
n - the child node to be inserted

removeChild

public boolean removeChild(Node n)
Removes a specified node n from the children of this node. If n is really a child of this node, the parent of n will become null and the older siblings information of n will be cleared after this method call.

Parameters:
n - the node to be removed from the children of this node
Returns:
true if the node n has been successfully removed from the children set of this node
